info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 03 at 1:48AM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...Hot this Holiday Weekend... This is a special weather statement from the National Weather Service Office in Riverton. * WHAT...Record breaking heat. * WHERE...Western and southern Wyoming. * WHEN...Through Labor Day. * HIGH TEMPERATURES...Upper 80s to mid 90s. * IMPACTS...Hot temperatures will significantly increase the potential for heat related illnesses, particularly for those working or participating in outdoor activities. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Drink plenty of non-alcoholic fluids. When possible reschedule outdoor activities to early morning or evening, and take frequent breaks in the shade. Check up on relatives and neighbors. Young children and pets should never be left unattended in vehicles under any circumstances.
